relation: FILEFORMS=operating-environment-form Specifies the default SYSOUT form for a print file. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Companion for z/OS
FILESYSOUT=sysout-class Specifies the default SYSOUT CLASS for a printer file. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Companion for z/OS
PRINTINIT | NOPRINTINIT Initializes the procedure output file. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Companion for z/OS
PRNGETLIST | NOPRNGETLIST specifies whether printers that are attached to the system are recognized. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Companion for Windows
SYSPRINT= * | DUMMY | ddname Specifies the handling of output that is directed to the default print file. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Companion for z/OS
pageTitle: System Options Syntax Sorted by Category :: SAS(R) 9.2 Language Reference by Name, Product, and Category
textBeforeTable: Communications: Email System Options Syntax by Category Next Page | Previous Page --> *** Begin Body ***
textAfterTable: Document: SAS Language Reference: Dictionary EMAILPW= System Option EMAILPW= " password" Specifies an e-mail logon password. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Language Reference: Dictionary EMAILSYS System Option -EMAILSYS SMTP | name-of-script EMAILSYS=SMTP | name-of-script Specifies the e-mail protocol to use for sending electronic mail. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Companion for the UNIX Environments EMAILSYS= System Option EMAILSYS= interface Specifies the e-mail protocol to use for sending electronic mail. Product: Base SAS Document: SAS Companion for z/OS
